_comments.compilerOptions: TypeScript compiler settings that control how TS code is compiled
_comments.lib: List of built-in JS libraries available - DOM, DOM iteration, and ES Next features
_comments.allowJs: Allow JavaScript files to be compiled alongside TypeScript
_comments.target: ES6 - the JavaScript version to compile TypeScript to
_comments.skipLibCheck: Skip type checking of declaration files for faster compilation
_comments.strict: Enable all strict type checking options for better type safety
_comments.noEmit: Don't emit JavaScript files, only type check (Next.js handles JS generation)
_comments.esModuleInterop: Enable compatibility between CommonJS and ES modules
_comments.module: esnext - use ES module syntax for better tree-shaking and bundling
_comments.moduleResolution: bundler - use bundler strategy for resolving module imports
_comments.resolveJsonModule: Allow importing JSON files directly in TypeScript
_comments.isolatedModules: Ensure each file can be transpiled independently
_comments.jsx: preserve - don't transform JSX, let Next.js handle it
_comments.incremental: Enable incremental compilation for faster subsequent builds
_comments.plugins: TypeScript plugins - 'next' plugin integrates Next.js specific type features
_comments.paths: Path aliases - '@/*' maps to project root for cleaner imports
_comments.include: Files to include in compilation - TypeScript and TSX files
_comments.exclude: Folders to exclude - node_modules are pre-compiled dependencies
